summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of North and West Seventy-sixth Street, from Fremont Avenue to Eighth Avenue Northwest; North Seventy-seventh Street, from Woodland Park Avenue to Greenwood Avenue; Fremont Avenue, from North Seventh-fifth Street to North Seventy-seventh Street; Third Avenue Northwest, from West Seventy-fourth Street to West Eightieth Street; Eighth Avenue Northwest, from West Seventy-fifth Street to West Seventy-ninth Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5793, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
